name: Let's Get Nepucated / ねぷけ〜しょん / 與妮普交流～
detailed_description:
With the Let's Get Nepucated DLC, Neptune will ask a series of hard hitting questions that she'll need to know before she feels comfortable around you. Questions like ""Do you like me?"" and ""What food do I like?"" are definite tests for the true Neptune fan! Get to know Neptune better by asking her select questions too!

Let's Get Nepucated DLC unlocks:
- Nepucation event

How to unlock the new DLC: After DLC installation go to Planeptune and than access "Information". At "Information" a selection called "Nepucation" will appear so please select "Nepucation" to access the new events. You must get up to at least chapter 2 to unlock "Nepucation".

short_description: Let's Get Nepucated DLC unlocks a special event called Nepucation

fullgame.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation / 神次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth3 V CENTURY / 神次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生3 Ｖ世紀

supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version. On-board graphics card are not recommend. Highly recommend to have an independent graphics card.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or 8 (64bit) or newer
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 with video card with 1GB ram and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: May not work properly with Windows 7 and 8 (32bit) version
